summary: It's 1941 but France is trapped in the nineteenth century, governed by steam and Napoleon V, where scientists vanish mysteriously. Avril (Marion Cotillard), a teenage girl, goes in search of her missing scientist parents.
cast: Marion Cotillard|Marc-André Grondin|Philippe Katerine|Jean Rochefort|Bouli Lanners|Olivier Gourmet|Macha Grenon|Benoît Brière|Anne Coesens|Carlos Alazraqui|Victor Brandt|Mark Camacho|Tod Fennell|Angela Galuppo|Paul Giamatti|Tony Hale|Tony Robinow|Susan Sarandon|J.K. Simmons|Roland Stone|Kari Wahlgren|Jim Ward|Mick Wingert
title: Avril y el mundo alternado
